forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the night unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the evening sky holds a gentle promise of calm. A low of 53 degrees settles into the air, accompanied by a soft southwest wind brushing lightly at around 6 to 9 mph. The transient clouds lend a delicate veil to the cityscape, hinting at the vibrant day that awaits just beyond the horizon.

Come Friday, golden rays will embrace the city, promising a sun-kissed day with temperatures hovering near 68, gracefully tapering to around 66 as afternoon approaches. The winds will pick up, stirring between 3 to 18 mph, with occasional gusts that may dance up to 23 mph. The clarity of the day will both uplift and refresh, casting a celebratory light on the iconic landmarks dotting the skyline. Some fog may cling in the morning, particularly closer to the bay, creating an enchanting landscape that complements the sunny mood of the day. For those stepping out, lightweight layers will be your best companion, ensuring comfort in the changing temperatures as the sun rises in resplendent authority. A stroll to one of the inviting waterfront cafés or a leisurely exploration of nearby parks may be just the remedy for this splendid summer day, allowing you to savor the beauty of the city in its most radiant light.
